name: Birdie Board Game
description:
Simple board game created for Mini Jam 99. Theme for this Jam was "Birds", so main character is a bird, who is trying to save his children before from the danger of the approaching fox. 

Controls: mouse

Roll button will roll the dice and move the bird pawn.

End Turn button will start the fox turn. 

Special fields:

* x2 - second dice roll in the same turn

* +1 - character will be moved to the next field

* -> or <- - move the character to the starting field

* key field - adds a key item which is needed to win the game

Rules:

Go to the central field (the one with the egg sprite) before the fox do it. You need to obtain the key item in order to finish the game.
